item.title: OP lifesteal auction house not working
item.author: invalid@example.com (PRATHAMEZZ)
item.dc:creator: PRATHAMEZZ
item.content:encoded:
The server of OP lifesteal is currently Facing an issue that the auction house is not opening for all the players it says an internal network connection error occured ,Well the auction house was my only way of making money but as of it is closed its causing alot of issues not just for me but the wholeserver
i hope any mod or admin sees this and replies the fix

item.title: Capping King Of The Hill
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hipp0griff)
item.dc:creator: Hipp0griff
item.content:encoded: So I joined today and OPLifesteal is pretty empty due to all the bugs Pika hasnt fixed and all the new ones which have occured (I dont know whos gonna play until they reset the gamemode) And I went to koth event that just started, I tried right clicking left clicking and breaking the chest but nothing happened? It says no one is capping koth and Capture time is still 5min . Maybe Koth is broken along with all the other stuff? Or is there some way I dont know of to activate it?

item.content:encoded: There's a nerd with the username of "aca11z", and he's lagging the whole server, threatening my friend with more lag if he doesn't stop attacking him, so how can I prove that he's the one lagging the server and where do I report him for it?

item.title: Players Hacking On Alts
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hipp0griff)
item.dc:creator: Hipp0griff
item.content:encoded:
So some players are creating alts so they can hack without the consequences being reflected onto their main accounts . How would You deal with that? I mean if someone says "Hey Im hacking im an alt of xyz" You cant really ban the player just for claiming they are a certain person on an alt. Im not sure what players use to dodge IP Bans but its really annoyong wanting to play on a server and a Hacker You just banned is right back on an alt. I understand that that falls under "Ban Evasion" but...

item.title: OPLifesteal Has Too Many Hackers
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hipp0griff)
item.dc:creator: Hipp0griff
item.content:encoded: Anyone else kinda disappointed by the amount of hackers just chilling on OPLifesteal? I definitely am. OPlifesteal would be 10X better if there wasn't so many hackers using combat hacks on that server . The hackers are known and constantly reported but with no results. I am planning on applying for staff as Pika def needs support in the OPLifesteal server . Is there anything we can do to make the server better w out just constantly reporting players to no avail?

item.title: Do Bans Have Reflection Times?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hipp0griff)
item.dc:creator: Hipp0griff
item.content:encoded: Earlier today I clipped and reported a player for using combat hacks , the report was accepted and on his profile it says he was banned with a refference to my clip . When I log on I see he is still online and hacking. Do bans only kick in within 24hrs or something?
